thread.title: Debra DuBritz O'Gorman
thread.title_full: ToursByLocals reviewed by Debra DuBritz O'Gorman

author: Debra DuBritz O'Gorman
title: Debra DuBritz O'Gorman
text: Our family group of three generations had an unforgettable day with Cinzia. We enjoyed seeing the mosaics around Ravenna and stopping in to the mosaic shops and the piadina shop. Cinzia was knowledgeable and flexible with the itinerary. Her interpretation of the mosaics brought the biblical stories to life. She even arranged for a driver to take us to Classe. We would not have gotten as much out of the visit to Ravenna without her services. Highly recommended.
